name: Phineas & Ferb: Day of Doofensmirtz
summary: Based on the smash-hit animated show, Phineas and Ferb bring their unique blend of fun, laughter and chaos to PS Vita in an exclusive new adventure, written and produced in collaboration with Disney. Hold on to your hat as the plucky pair battle Doctor Doofenshmirtz and his minions across the city of Danville and far beyond.
